name: US Data Corporation
tag_list: mailing-list, mobile-marketing, mailing-lists, email-marketing, direct-marketing, sales-leads, email-lists, email-broadcast, data-hygiene, direct-mail-marketing, b2b-marketing, b2c-marketing
overview:
US Data Corporation is a provider of mailing lists, sales leads, email lists, email marketing, text marketing and data hygiene services.

US Data Corporation maintains a database of over 300 million consumers and over 14 million businesses. We keep track of the information that you need to develop an effective ideal customer profile. Once you have a profile developed, you and your account manager select the criteria that will generate your marketing list or marketing broadcast.

At US Data Corporation, we concentrate our resources on generating and maintaining high quality mailing lists and sales leads. We are both a data compiler and a data amalgamator which means we compile our own mailing lists and sales leads but we also outsource data when need be. We have relationships with all of the major players in the data world which gives our clients access to every bit of information available. With our 5 Step Data Hygiene Process, US Data Corporation focuses on updating and cleaning every record we sell which is how we can guarantee our data 100%.

Though US Data Corporation’s roots are in traditional mailing lists, we have focused on expanding our dominance in the email list and email broadcast world. Our emphasis on quality stems to our broadcasting services, as well. When other marketing companies strive to be the low priced leader, US Data Corporation knows it takes money to make money and providing anything but stellar mailing lists, sales leads and marketing services is a waste of time.
